title: ICYMI - Why Are African Americans Being Hit the Hardest by COVID-19?
itunes:title: ICYMI - Why Are African Americans Being Hit the Hardest by COVID-19?
description:
Trevor examines the role systemic racism is playing in the outsized rate of coronavirus infections hitting black people in the U.S.
